The antique lamp is an item obtained from Commander Fullore after completing the quest A Kingdom Divided. It grants 10,000 experience in a skill of the player's choosing, given that the skill is over level 40.

The lamp cannot be banked. However, if the player prefers to use it at a later date, it can be destroyed and reclaimed from Commander Fullore whenever the player wishes to do so.

[[File:Antique lamp (A Kingdom Divided) detail.png|left|180px]]
The '''antique lamp''' is an item obtained from [[Commander Fullore]] after completing the [[quest]] [[A Kingdom Divided]]. It grants 10,000 [[experience]] in a [[skill]] of the player's choosing, given that the skill is over level 40.

The lamp cannot be banked. However, if the player prefers to use it at a later date, it can be destroyed and reclaimed from [[Commander Fullore]] whenever the player wishes to do so.

{{A Kingdom Divided}}
